entry.name: Academy1Description
entry.value: Suit the equipment to the soldier, not the soldier to the equipment.

entry.name: Academy2Description
entry.value: Direct downlink to a centralized combat database enhances troop efficiency.

entry.name: Aircraft0Description
entry.value: Electrically powered propulsion system that brings war to the skies.

entry.name: Aircraft1Description
entry.value: The integration of artificial intelligence and various countermeasure systems into airborne units.

entry.name: Aircraft2Description
entry.value: This bulky hull replacement allows aircrafts to utilize the ionization happening in Pandora's thermosphere for various goals.

entry.name: AlienDescription
entry.value: Study of alien corpses and live subject behaviour to expand knowledge of their species.

entry.name: Armor0Description
entry.value: Basic steel armor for troops to increase the resistance against enemy weaponry.

entry.name: Armor1Description
entry.value: Robust armor forged from titanium, a familiar metal found in abundance on Pandora.

entry.name: Armor2Description
entry.value: Experiments with titanium and mexallon show a high chemical compatibility that could improve titanium armor.

entry.name: Armor3Description
entry.value: A new formula that allows us to analyze and optimize armor on a molecular level.

entry.name: Armor4Description
entry.value: The techniques required to process adamantium, a very heavy and resistant material found deep below the planetary surface that is highly suited for armors.

entry.name: Armor5Description
entry.value: An alloy for armors that is ultra light but extremely robust.

entry.name: Armor6Description
entry.value: Leads to an entirely new level of armor design that utilizes roaming neutrons produced by its own embedded reactor.

entry.name: Armor7Description
entry.value: Allows to coat armor with a layer of relatively stable and incredibly powerful anti-matter.

entry.name: Armor8Description
entry.value: Imagine an anti-matter armor that is self-aware and "lives" for one sole purpose: to protect its wearer.

entry.name: Artillery0Description
entry.value: Drone-supported, heavy long range weaponry that can shred whole troop formations.

entry.name: Artillery1Description
entry.value: Simultaneous burst of mid-air shells covers a wider area and leaves little chance of surviving bombardments.

entry.name: Artillery2Description
entry.value: Advanced shrapnels that generate portable gravitational fields.

entry.name: AssaultDescription
entry.value: Orbital reconnaissance and troop landing operation for a one-time military strike anywhere on the planet.

entry.name: ATV0Description
entry.value: Adaption of vehicles to the environmental parameters of the new world.

entry.name: ATV1Description
entry.value: Enhanced shock absorption gives light vehicles an edge in rough terrain and difficult maneuvers.

entry.name: ATV2Description
entry.value: An electrostatic protection layer further protects ATVs against common weapons.

entry.name: Automatic1Description
entry.value: Advanced automatic weapons based on stochastic methods.

entry.name: Automatic2Description
entry.value: Development of a magazine that safely stores mutagen-loaded rounds able to provoke spontaneous cellular decay.

entry.name: BlackHoleDescription
entry.value: Industrial production of non-radioactive mass destruction weapons.

entry.name: Cannon0Description
entry.value: Tank breakers as an answer to heavy war machinery.

entry.name: Cannon1Description
entry.value: Design for a cannon emitting a dense beam of photons that generates a powerful electromagnetic field.

entry.name: Cannon2Description
entry.value: Development of a cannon shooting high frequency, faster-than-light particles that can pierce any type of protection.

entry.name: ColonizationDescription
entry.value: Focus the efforts of the colony on expansion for a while.

entry.name: CreditsDescription
entry.value: The use of a whole new array of data helps obtain new structures and technologies at a competitive price.

entry.name: Credits0Description
entry.value: Facilitation of economic development through the establishment of an organized market.

entry.name: Credits1Description
entry.value: Examines the ways in which the working processes of a market affect transactions and trading behavior.

entry.name: Credits2Description
entry.value: Trade may be a good way to sustain an economy, but loading the dice is still better than gambling randomly.

entry.name: DefenseDescription
entry.value: Organize defense systems in a more efficient way thanks to a centralized HQ.

entry.name: Defense0Description
entry.value: Advanced improvised barricades used in city warfare.

entry.name: Defense1Description
entry.value: Embed the colony with a grid of varied defenses against all kinds of threats.

entry.name: Defense2Description
entry.value: Gauge the menace from without, then provide security from within our walls.

entry.name: DiplomacyDescription
entry.value: Diplomatic relations can be improved with the establishment of a multicultural council.

entry.name: DropPodDescription
entry.value: Technology and logistics required to deploy respectable troop formations out of orbit and behind enemy lines.

entry.name: EMPBeamDescription
entry.value: Satellite with mounted electromagnetic cannon aimed at the disruption of enemy production.

entry.name: Flak0Description
entry.value: Real-time flight prediction that allows very effective ground-to-air weaponry.

entry.name: Flak1Description
entry.value: Mid-range fragmentation allows ground-to-air projectiles to cover a large zone.

entry.name: Flak2Description
entry.value: Far more potent than electromagnetic pulses, sprite lightnings can hit a wide area in the atmosphere with devastating effects.

entry.name: Flame0Description
entry.value: New mobile ignition system producing flames with a temperature of over 2000 degrees Celsius, able to melt any kind of flesh.

entry.name: Flame1Description
entry.value: Basic, yet memorable, chemistry crash course for the enemy.

entry.name: Flame2Description
entry.value: Highly specialized weapons using the local fauna and flora.

entry.name: Food0Description
entry.value: Agriculture made possible on any soil.

entry.name: Food1Description
entry.value: Plant growth in an air or mist environment without the use of soil or an aggregate medium.

entry.name: Food2Description
entry.value: Replicate existing food to satisfy the nutritional demands of mega cities growing beyond expectations.

entry.name: FoodMineralsDescription
entry.value: Utilize the space vessel used to reach Pandora by dismantling it for resources.

entry.name: GoldenAgeDescription
entry.value: Rejoice as the colony enters a new age of enlightenment and harmony.

entry.name: GrowthDescription
entry.value: Artificial human breeding helps population growth for a while.

entry.name: Laser0Description
entry.value: Design of an electrically powered device capable of producing a solid state beam of 100 kW or more.

entry.name: Laser1Description
entry.value: Fusing excited deuterium and tritium nuclei with helium can release a deadlier laser beam.

entry.name: Laser2Description
entry.value: The discovery of graviton particles along with their utilization in beam weapons.

entry.name: Mech0Description
entry.value: Gigantic war machines that dominate the battle field.

entry.name: Mech1Description
entry.value: Push the mech to a new size level with an adamantium based hull.

entry.name: Mech2Description
entry.value: A man-machine and the largest mech ever designed. Unrivaled on the battlefield.

entry.name: Minerals0Description
entry.value: Refining process for Pandora's rich mineral sources.

entry.name: Minerals2Description
entry.value: Mineral extraction with the use of precise microwarps.

entry.name: Missile1Description
entry.value: A basic, cheap missile AI designed for target pursuit, ensuring minimal mistakes and enhanced accuracy.

entry.name: Missile2Description
entry.value: State of the art missile design to put matter-antimatter reactions to good use.

entry.name: Morale0Description
entry.value: The next level of digital visualization in entertainment.

entry.name: Morale1Description
entry.value: Neurosurgery and conditioning dedicated to standard of living improvement.

entry.name: Morale2Description
entry.value: The latest advancements in neurobiofeedback manipulation research allow for better handling of stressful situations for the population.

entry.name: MovementDescription
entry.value: Improve troop movement speed by manipulating time like any other dimension.

entry.name: NanoRobotsDescription
entry.value: Nanorobots specifically engineered and programmed for nanomedicinal and repair purposes.

entry.name: NukeDescription
entry.value: Global nuclear weapons delivery system that opens the door to thermonuclear warfare.

entry.name: PollutionDescription
entry.value: Careful planning, execution and monitoring to alleviate pollution problems that may arise.

entry.name: Pollution0Description
entry.value: Identify and remedy a major downside of industrialization.

entry.name: Pollution2Description
entry.value: Create a wholly new atmosphere from existing data.

entry.name: PopulationDescription
entry.value: Optimize space occupation and population growth in your colonies.

entry.name: Population1Description
entry.value: Creation of gravitomagnetic fields for practical use in urban planning.

entry.name: Population2Description
entry.value: Immortality may still be a myth, but there are other means to ensure an impossibly long life.

entry.name: PowerDescription
entry.value: The ability to read into others' minds can help on many accounts.

entry.name: ProductionDescription
entry.value: The introduction of a regulating authority favors the punctuality and respect of business contracts, helping productivity.

entry.name: Production0Description
entry.value: Production machines that build production machines.

entry.name: Production2Description
entry.value: Self-replication further enhances production by eliminating human interaction.

entry.name: PromotionDescription
entry.value: Promote your troops through advanced training methods in the field.

entry.name: ResearchDescription
entry.value: Evolution brings changes to cephalic development, along with improved intelligence.

entry.name: Research0Description
entry.value: Explanation of classical field theory in newer ways.

entry.name: Research1Description
entry.value: On-the-fly recalculation of phase spaces greatly enhances theoretical experiment results.

entry.name: Research2Description
entry.value: Breakthroughs in M-Theory studies to revolutionize the way we think about causality in research.

entry.name: ScanDescription
entry.value: Knowledge is power: a satellite uplink allows us to employ satellites for planetary reconnaissance from space.

entry.name: SightDescription
entry.value: Movement and heat detectors would allow us to see enemies from farther away.

entry.name: Sniper0Description
entry.value: Development of an advanced gun chamber that gives precision rifle bullets extraordinary speed, range and accuracy.

entry.name: Sniper1Description
entry.value: Highly ionized ammo for sniper rifles able to incapacitate that which has not been destroyed or killed.

entry.name: Sniper2Description
entry.value: Quantic bullets specifically tailored for precision weapons that inflict cellular warping to their target.

entry.name: Tank0Description
entry.value: Massive hull with mechanical and electrostatic deflection design that allows us to produce heavily armored combat vehicles.

entry.name: Tank1Description
entry.value: The use of carbon allotropes further enhances the capacity of heavily armored tanks.

entry.name: Tank2Description
entry.value: Explore the frightening possibility of a tank being directly connected to its crew.

entry.name: TeleportationDescription
entry.value: The instant displacement of matter is finally within your reach.

entry.name: TerraformDescription
entry.value: Large-scale bioenvironmental study of Pandora to better assess and use the possibilities offered by the terrain.

entry.name: TransportDescription
entry.value: Logistics required to ship ground troops across the sea.

entry.name: Watercraft0Description
entry.value: Direct-drive generators mounted on watercraft ensure optimal hydropower in all conditions.

entry.name: Watercraft1Description
entry.value: A thick, sloped complementary belt layer further enhances watercraft protection.

entry.name: Watercraft2Description
entry.value: This watercraft design is reinforced against physical damage and grounded against all kinds of non-physical ones.
